description.displayText:
It's a pleasure writing about Silvia!
I have known her for years!
She works as my secretary and she is a person that you can trust! She is loyal and reliable.
She oversees what needs to be done in situations that need a quick response. She makes immediate decisions, but follows instructions with no problem.
She has lots of energy and goodwill and is a pleasant person to be with!
I admire the way she has raised her children (they are young men now) with a good balance in love and limits.
Silvia is emotionally stable and easy going!
Sincerely, 
Clicia
